talk.utter: I sometimes wish I could separate the function of following someone that's a sign of appreciation and respect from the function of actually seeing all those posts! That's the main thing stopping me from doing some unfollowing and creating a bunch of topic lists to check when I like

talk.author: did:plc:qrllvid7s54k4hnwtqxwetrf
talk.utter: I'd love to follow *more* people so they know that I like and respect them! But if anything I want to see *fewer* posts, because right now my TL is pretty overwhelming
